name: The Adventures of Bayou Billy™
description: Brawl through the Louisiana Bayou all the way to New Orleans' famous Bourbon Street with former U.S. soldier Billy West, determined to save his homeland and his fiancée from local mobster Godfather Gordon and his crew. The Adventures of Bayou Billy™ is a classic NES™ action game, notorious for combining beat 'em up sequences with driving and shooting stages. The shooting stages could even be played with the Zapper light gun, now replaced with the Wii Remote™ in this Virtual Console™ release. This is the US version of the game.
